author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Corinthia Hotels premiere at IMEX America 2015Travelandtourworld.com
text:
Corinthia Hotels premiere at IMEX America 2015  
Corinthia Hotels, the internationally-renowned brand of luxury hotels, will attend IMEX America for the first time this year, October 13-15, 2015, to showcase its outstanding “Events at Corinthia” program and recent upgrades to its MICE facilities and initiatives across the portfolio. The five-star Corinthia properties in London, Budapest, St Petersburg, Prague and Lisbon will be represented at the Las Vegas trade show, at Booth 1957.
 
Dale Scharlat, Head of MICE & Group Sales for Corinthia Hotels since 2013, and the primary MICE sales contact for the North America region, will be taking appointments during IMEX. Dale is based in New York and works closely with her European colleagues to drive brand recognition and sales in the American group and MICE market. She was previously Director of Group Sales (North America) with Concorde Hotels & Resorts and has over 20 years of industry experience with strong background in Global Sales
 
Source:- Corinthia Hotels
